Title: Exempts notice provisions for claims brought against a party for certain sexual offenses
Summary: Exempts notice provisions for claims brought against a party for certain offenses including sex offenses, incest or the use of a child in a sexual performance.
LawCode: Amd ยง11, Ct Claims Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the court of claims act, in relation to exemptions of notice provisions for claims brought against a party for certain sexual offenses
